headline: EU’s Stricter Crypto Tax Reporting Rules Take Effect January 2026: Is DAC8 A Crackdown On Crypto?
summary: US prosecutors just sent Samourai Wallet co-founder Keonne Rodriguez to prison for five years over Bitcoin money-laundering charges, in one of the toughest blows yet to crypto privacy tools. Bitcoin price barely reacted, as BTC USD traded in a tight range around major support, while traders enjoyed their Christmas dinner ...

headline: Crypto M&A Hits Record $8.6B in 2025 as Coinbase, Kraken Lead Deal Surge
summary: The crypto industry closed out the year with a record $8.6 billion in mergers and acquisitions, driven by pro-crypto policies from the White House. With Coinbase’s historic $2.9 billion acquisition of Deribit leading the charge, is big tech consolidation taking over crypto? CoinDesk's Jennifer Sanasie hosts "CoinDesk Daily."

headline: It's a Risk-Off Day After Christmas on Wall Street
summary: The day after Christmas is supposed to be one of the better days of the year. It’s not looking like that right now. After trading higher to start the day, the S&P 500 has dipped 0.04%, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average and Nasdaq Composite have slipped 0.

headline: Jim Cramer Slams 'Big Freakout' Selling In Nvidia, AI, Crypto Stocks After Strong GDP Print: 'It Is Just Stupid'
summary: Market commentator and popular TV personality Jim Cramer vented frustration Tuesday over strong economic data triggering panic in high-growth sectors such as artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency. Cramer Finds Knee-Jerk Reaction ‘Stupid’ Cramer described the reaction as a “big freakout” that “never ends,” affecting stocks such as NVIDIA Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA) and those related to cryptocurrency, quantum computing, and data centers. “It is just stupid,” the "Mad Money" host said. The big freako
